doc.previous: Longest shuttle mission for Discovery shortest shuttle mission for Discovery
doc.after: The Flow Director was responsible for the overall preparation of the shuttle for launch and processing it after landing and remained permanently assigned to head the spacecraft s ground crew while the astronaut flight crews changed for every mission Each shuttle s Flow Director was supported by a Vehicle Manager for the same spacecraft Space shuttle Discovery s Flow Directors were
